artist: Takehara Shunchōsai; Niwa Tōkei (double pages 3, 6, 8 etc); Takehara Shunsensai (double pages 35, 39); Author: Akisato Ritō
creditline: Gift of Captain G. B. Powell, Jr., JAGC, USA
medium: Woodblock printed book, ink on paper
portfolio: Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Settsu (Settsu meisho zue 摂津名所圖會)
text: Devoted to Sumiyoshi Province 住吉郡. Niwa Tokei designed the double pages 3, 6, 8, 11, 14, 15, 16, 26b, 27, 30, 31, 32, 40, 44, 47, 49, 51, 64.
title: Pictorial Guide to Famous Sights in Settsu, vol. 1
